ACGrenade.name: O'Brien V.190 Knave
ACGrenade.description: One of Conor O'Brien's best traits was his ability to modernize and make use of older technology in his designs. The v.190 Knave is the perfect example of this philosophy. Fitted with a modified, outdated twin-grenade launcher turret, the Knave is a surprising combination of speed and subterfuge that quickly routs the enemy, leaving them befuddled.
ACGrenade.ammoUsed: Tremola Grenade GPb-1, PT-815 Smoke Grenade, Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade, B2 Varsi Anti-Tank Grenade

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

ACMGW.name: O'Brien V.110
ACMGW.description: Warden Armoured Cars are quick, well-rounded urban assault platforms. These anti-infantry vehicles are equipped with twin-barrelled machineguns.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

TankDestroyerHeavy.name: Noble Widow MK. XIV
TankDestroyerHeavy.description: This deadly tank turns predator into prey. A tank Destroyer, the Noble Widow specializes in ambush tactics, waiting for its quarry and striking with destructive high-velocity shells.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Cannoneer (Front): Equipped with a hight velocity barrel that deals 75% extra damage per shot
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

FieldAntiTankCollins.name: Collins Cannon 68mm
FieldAntiTankCollins.description: The Collins Cannon is a mobile Anti-Tank field gun firing 68mm armour-piercing rounds.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles
Cannoneer (Right): High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

FieldCannon.name: Balfour Wolfhound
FieldCannon.description: This destructive short-ranged cannon is designed for direct engagement with enemy fortifications. The Wolfhound is fitted with reinforced shielding and a 40mm barrel.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles

FieldMachinegunSwallowtail.name: Swallowtail 988/127-2
FieldMachinegunSwallowtail.description: A dual barreled, high calibre anti-infantry machine gun. The Swallowtail is fitted with forward-facing armour plating and is excellent for suppression.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles
Gunner (Right): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot
Suppression causes enemies to lose stability

FieldMortarFalconer.name: Balfour Falconer 250mm
FieldMortarFalconer.description: A heavy mobile mortar platform fitted with a thick frontal shield for assaulting fortified locations.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles

HalfTrackNiska.name: Niska Mk. I  Gun Motor Carriage
HalfTrackNiska.description: Designed for escort missions and to support infantry operations, the Niska Gun Motor Carriage Half-Track is an armoured, versatile all-terrain vehicle that can be equipped with a variety of mounted weapons.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

APCMulloy.name: Mulloy LPC
APCMulloy.description: The Mulloy Landing Personnel Carrier is an armoured amphibious vehicle designed for carrying troops across large bodies of water to aid in coordinated beach landings and flanking assaults.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

LightTankDevitt.name: Devitt Mk. III
LightTankDevitt.description: A highly maneuverable lightweight tank. Designed for urban enviroments, the Devitt is fitted with a 40mm cannon.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

TruckAmbulanceResponder.name: Dunne Responder 3e
TruckAmbulanceResponder.description: The Responder Ambulance is efficient at transporting Critically Wounded Soldiers and carrying medical supplies.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

TruckBusCaravaner.name: Dunne Caravaner 2f
TruckBusCaravaner.description: The Caravaner is a transport vehicle used to shuttle personnel to the front line

ACMGC.name: T3 "Xiphos"
ACMGC.description: Colonial Armoured Cars are quick, well-rounded urban assault platforms. These anti-infantry vehicles are equipped with twin-barreled machineguns.

FieldMortarTisiphone.name: 30-250 "Tisiphone" Field Cannon
FieldMortarTisiphone.description: The 30-250 "Tisiphone" Field Cannon is mobilized destruction incarnate. An infantry unit armed with these mortar cannons signals imminent devastation to enemy structures and emplacements.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles

ArtilleryKoronides.name: 120-68 "Koronides" Field Gun
ArtilleryKoronides.description: A long range Colonial mobile artillery used to lay siege to fortified positions.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

HalfTrackJavelin.name: HH-a "Javelin"
HalfTrackJavelin.description: Designed for escort missions and to support infantry operations, the HH-a class "Javelin" Half-Track is an armoured, versatile all-terrain vehicle that can be equipped with a variety of mounted weapons.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

APCAcheron.name: AB-8 "Acheron"
APCAcheron.description: The "Acheron" is an armoured amphibious vehicle designed for carrying troops across large bodies of water to aid in coordinated beach landings and flanking assaults.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

LightTankHatchet.name: H-5 "Hatchet"
LightTankHatchet.description: A highly maneuverable lightweight tank. Designed for urban enviroments, the "Hatchet" is fitted with a 40mm cannon.

TruckAmbulanceSalus.name: R-12 - "Salus" Ambulance
TruckAmbulanceSalus.description: The "Salus" Ambulance is efficient at transporting Critically Wounded Soldiers carrying medical supplies.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

TruckBusChariot.name: R-15 - "Chariot"
TruckBusChariot.description: The "Chariot" is a transport vehicle used to shuttle personnel to the front line.

ConstructionVehicle.name: BMS - Universal Assembly Rig
ConstructionVehicle.description: A specialized vehicle designed by the Basset Motor Society used in the construction of large structures.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

Crane.name: BMS - Class 2 Mobile Auto-Crane
Crane.description: The Basset Motor Society's Class 2 Mobile Auto-Crane is used to lift and reposition vehicles and very heavy equipment.

general: Carries 1 shippable

TruckFlatbed.name: BMS - Packmule Flatbed
TruckFlatbed.description: A heavy duty shipping transport truck designed by Basset Motor Society. It's built for hauling the heaviest of equipment over long distances with ease.

general: Carries 1 shippable

TruckFuelFuelrunner.name: Dunne Fuelrunner 2d
TruckFuelFuelrunner.description: The Fuelrunner is a heavy Dunne rig designed to transport and distribute large quantities of Fuel.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

CruiserTankBrigand.name: Gallagher Brigand Mk. I
CruiserTankBrigand.description: The first of Colm Gallagher's mid-sized tanks, the Brigand is a true brute on the battlefield. Not quite as sturdy as its younger siblings, the Brigand compensates with higher mobility, which, when paired with a mounted machine gun and 30mm repeater cannon, is a deadly force in any armour division. Seeing his hometown sundered at the hands of the Swords in a border skirmish before the onset of the Boreal Wars, Gallagher grew fixated on engineering a versatile yet sturdy tank. The Brigand was the result of his fixation.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Engine can be boosted for increased top speed

AssaultTankSilverhand.name: Silverhand - Mk. IV
AssaultTankSilverhand.description: The Silverhand assault tank is fitted with destructive dual-barrel armaments, and heavy frontal and rear armour. Its 68mm frontal cannon is paired with a lighter 40mm turret.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Gunner (Front): High chance to penetrate armoued vehicles

MotorcycleKivela.name: Kivela Power Wheel 80-1
MotorcycleKivela.description: A Warden motorcycle used in patrols and fitted with a sidecar. The Kiveal Power Wheel can also gain a momentary speed boost by burning additional fuel.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Engine can be boosted for increased top speed

ScoutTankSpire.name: King Spire Mk. I
ScoutTankSpire.description: This small tank has been recently recommissioned to the Warden arsenal. It boasts a high maneuverability and an antenna that allows for long-range communications during high-stakes recon operations.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Turret (Front): Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 36% less damage per shot
Suppression causes enemies to lose stability

LightUtilityVehicleDrummond.name: Drummond 100a
LightUtilityVehicleDrummond.description: A multipurpose off-road Warden vehicle that can scout nearby targets.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

TruckFuelStolon.name: RR-3 "Stolon" Tanker
TruckFuelStolon.description: The "Stolon" Tanker is heavier R-series rig designed to transport and distribute large quantities of Fuel.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

AssaultTankBardiche.name: 86K-a "Bardiche"
AssaultTankBardiche.description: Unlike the 85-series, the "Bardiche" sports a heavier, more durable build and is fitted with a coaxial heavy machinegun along with a powerful, short-barreled 68mm turret. Modern Kraunian engineering allows for a fast reload, making it an ideal tool to combat enemy armour.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Cannoneer (Center): High chance to penetrate armoued vehicles
Gunner (Right): Suppression causes enemies to lose stability

AssaultTankNemesis.name: 90T-v "Nemesis"
AssaultTankNemesis.description: With immense off-road capabilities, the 90T-v "Nemesis" is a highly versatile armoured vehicle. While it may not boast the defensive capabilities of its more heavily armoured cousins, the "Nemesis" shatters enemy formations with its deadly 68mm cannon and auxillary grenade launcher. This unique vehicle earned its namesake on its first deployment during an expediton to the Alliant Union. A Nevish Alliance armed convoy was crossing through wetlands when a wave of 90T-v tanks intercepted the convoy from between reeds and murky terrain.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Gunner (Center): High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

AssaultTankFalchion.name: 85K-b "Falchion"
AssaultTankFalchion.description: Designed for mass production in Kraunia, this assault tank features a modular turret system for maximum versatility. The "Falchion" class features a powerfull if understated, 40mm cannon.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

SiegeTankMG.name: HC-2 "Scorpion"
SiegeTankMG.description: The "Scorpion" HC-class tank is a moderately armoured infantry support vehicle with twin, high-powered heavy machine guns and short-range radios for improved intelligence support. In addition, exterior seating is available for infantry.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Gunner (Right), Gunner (Left): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot
Suppression causes enemies to lose stability

MotorcycleCaster.name: 03MM "Caster"
MotorcycleCaster.description: A motorcycle and sidecar used to patrol large areas. Speed can be boosted at the cost of additional fuel/

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

LightUtilityVehicleArgonaut.name: UV-05a "Argonaut"
LightUtilityVehicleArgonaut.description: This stripped down Light Utility Vehicle provides extra seating for a small crew to engage in hit and run tactics.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

TanketteActaeon.name: T12 "Actaeon" Tankette
TanketteActaeon.description: This complete overhaul of the T3 Armoured Car is reinforced with tank armour. While these extra defenses lower the T12's overall speed and handling, the addition of treads provide increased performance in less than ideal terrain.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

TrailerResource.name: Rooster - Junkwagon
TrailerResource.description: A simple towable trailer that holds common building resources.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles

TruckDumpLoadlugger.name: Dunne Loadlugger 3c
TruckDumpLoadlugger.description: This standard Truck is fitted with a resource hopper in place of the standard cargo hold. This allows for a much greater capacity for resources at the expense of space for cargo.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

TruckDunne.name: Dunne Transport
TruckDunne.description: A heavy-duty Warden truck used to mobilize troops and supplies.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Can tow certain vehicles

ShipSiegeBlackguard.name: 81f-f Ronan Blackguard
ShipSiegeBlackguard.description: A shore-strafing gunship, the Blackguard's heavy mortar blitz makes short work of coastline bunker networks. Sporting ample storage for mortar shells means a no-frills approach to overall engineering. While the Blackguard may need a nearby escort, it more than makes up for it with pure guile.

Cannoneer (Midships): Can ruin structures that have been severely damaged by artillery
Always has a chance to breach a bunker
Increased chance to breach a bunker

ShipGunboatRonan.name: 74b-1 Ronan Gunship
ShipGunboatRonan.description: The 74b-1 Ronan Gunship specializes in roaming between larger vessel at high-speeds and boring into their hulls with ease. It's armed with multiple tripod mounts to suppor the midship high-explosive mortar cannon.
ShipGunboatRonan.ammoUsed: Mortar Shell, Shrapnel Mortar Shell, Flare Mortar Shell

TruckHauler.name: R-1 Hauler
TruckHauler.description: A heavy-duty Colonial truck used to mobilize troops and supplies.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Can tow certain vehicles

TruckDumpAtlas.name: R-5 "Atlas" Hauler
TruckDumpAtlas.description: This standard Truck is fitted with a resource hopper in place of the standard cargo hold. This allows for a much greater capacity for resources at the expense of space for cargo.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables

ShipSiegeLucian.name: Type B - "Lucian"
ShipSiegeLucian.description: This shoreline "bunker buster" packs quite a punch to any unfortunately positioned enemy emplacements. The Type B was gifted its colloquial name in jest in response to the discovery that its first-ever captain, Lucian Kelly, once served in the Caoivish Naval Command.

Gunner (Stern): Can ruin structures that have been severely damaged by artillery
$Always has a chance to breach bunkers
Decreased chance to breach a bunker

ShipGunboatCharon.name: Type C - "Charon"
ShipGunboatCharon.description: A small, versatile naval jack of all trades. The "Charon" is fitted with a single mortar cannon and two tripod mounts. Effective at both shoreline assaults and hit and run tactics agaisnt larger vessels.
ShipGunboatCharon.ammoUsed: Mortar Shell, Shrapnel Mortar Shell, Flare Mortar Shell

ShipFreighterMini.name: Das Krokodil by VAC
ShipFreighterMini.description: This deep water Venchin Auto Corporation light freighter is a sturdy vessel that specializes in seaport-to-seaport deliveries. As a deep water ship, Das Krokodil can't safely reach land-based shipping structures.

ShipInfantryFathomer.name: 68A-4 Ronan Fathomer
ShipInfantryFathomer.description: This naval escort ship excels at sea-to-air engagements, providing friendly naval vessels with critical protection from enemy aircraft. The 68-series remains one of Patrick Ronan's favourite designs. Having been comissioned by the Watchers to aid in coastal investigations, this modification—given the designation A-4—has since eclipsed its forebear's ubiquity.

ShipInfantrySombre.name: K-81e "Sombre"
ShipInfantrySombre.description: The "Sombre" is an escort gunship that excels at deterring air-to-naval aggression. Fitted with paired machine gun turrets and boasting a heavier frame than most vessels of comparable size, this Kraunian-made K-81e emerges at a moment's notice to defend its charge.

ShipBarge.name: BMS - Aquatipper
ShipBarge.description: A large shipping vessel, the Aquatipper is used to transport vehicles, equipment, and personnel over large bodies of water.

general: Carries 1 shippable

ShipFreighter.name: BMS - Ironship
ShipFreighter.description: The Basset Motor Society's Ironship-class shipping vessel is used to freight shippable goods and heavy vehicles.

general: Carries 5 shippables

ShipMediumOrnitier.name: Rinnspeir Ornitier-Class Gunship
ShipMediumOrnitier.description: Known as the "Bounty Hunter of the Sea", the Ornitier is a deadly ship-to-ship weapons platform. While not as manouverable as smaller vessels, its sturdy frame allows it to take much more punishment. Twing gunwale-mounted cannons provide ample firepower to punch holes in enemy ships, while its bow-mounted RPG launcher ends any chase before it has a chance to begin.

ShipMediumStrider.name: Strider
ShipMediumStrider.description: A small but sturdy naval weapons platform excelling in ship-to-ship combat. Deadly to both enemy vessels and crew, the Type D comes fitted with starboard and port-facing machine guns alongside bow and stern-facting cannons.

ShipMinelayer.name: Bellweather by VAC
ShipMinelayer.description: A simple vessel designed to lay out and maintain naval mines. Manufactured by the Venchin Auto Corporation, the Bellweather was originally commissioned by the Wenitan Naval Guard. Sensing further opportunities for profit, VAC began marketing the Bellweather to navies beyond Katoma, finally reaching Caoivish shores.

Gunner (Stern): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot
Suppression causes enemies to lose stability
